Monthly: EC2- increased number of instances from total 6 to 8 for the Web Servers and 6 to 8 for the Application Servers
RDS - increased number of instances from 1 to 2. One master per availability zone
Route 53 - increased number of Elastic Network Instances from 5 to 10
VPC - increased number of NAT Gateways from 1 to 2. One per availability zone
Application Load Balancer - increased number of processed GB per month (EC2 and IP)
Network Load Balancer - increased number of processed GB per month (NLB for TCP)
CouldWatch - increased number of logs and metrics
Web Application Firewall- introduced web application firewall
